question: Are you a permanent resident of Greece?
Are you insured under any social security institution in Greece (e.g. e-EFKA, OAEE, OGA)?
Do you have Taxisnet credentials to log in to gov.gr?
Is your insurance coverage currently active (i.e., can you receive healthcare services in Greece)?
Does the application concern only you or also your dependents (e.g. children, spouse)?
When do you plan to travel abroad?
